content: I got a Keychron K3 Pro through work and I absolutely adore it. It’s a joy to type with and sounds satisfying without being too noisy. It came with linear switches, which I don’t usually use.

photo.alt: A picture of an ANSI layout ten key-less wireless keyboard. The keys are grey and dark grey, except for the return, backspace, and escape keys which are grass green. The return key is labelled “ship it”, the backspace “simplify”, and the escape has the Shopify bag logo on it.
